title: DACx578 Functional Block Diagram
summary: Functional architecture of the DACx578 showing eight channel data buffers, DAC registers, and output DAC blocks with shared control logic and power-down control. Serial interface pins, reference input, and channel outputs are identified.

structured_data.mermaid:
flowchart LR
  SDA[SDA] --> ICL[Input Control Logic]
  SCL[SCL] --> ICL
  ICL --> BC[Buffer Control]
  ICL --> RC[Register Control]
  BC --> DBA[Data Buffer A]
  BC --> DBH[Data Buffer H]
  DBA --> DRA[DAC Register A]
  DBH --> DRH[DAC Register H]
  DRA --> DACA[8/10/12-bit DAC A]
  DRH --> DACH[8/10/12-bit DAC H]
  DACA --> VOUTA[VOUT_A]
  DACH --> VOUTH[VOUT_H]
  AVDD[AVDD] --> CORE[DACx578 Core]
  VREF[VREFIN] --> CORE
  LDAC[LDAC] --> BC
  CLR[CLR] --> RC
  RSTSEL[RSTSEL] --> RC
  ADDR0[ADDR0] --> ICL
  ADDR1[ADDR1] --> ICL
  PDL[Power-Down Control Logic] --> CORE
